After Sales+Extended Services.KPIS: Number of vehicles customized per month.
After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Total count of vehicles customized by the company each month, indicating the volume of customization activities.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Total Number of Vehicles Customized / Number of Months

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of vehicle customizations completed accurately according to customer specifications and requirements.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Customizations / Total Number of Customizations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Satisfaction level of customers with the quality and outcome of their vehicle customization, measured through surveys or feedback.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Vehicle Customization

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Average time required to complete a vehicle customization from the initial order to final delivery, reflecting the efficiency of the customization process.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Average Time from Customization Order to Completion

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each vehicle customization, including materials, labor, and overhead expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Total Cost of Vehicle Customizations / Total Number of Vehicles Customized

After Sales+Extended Services.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) from vehicle customization.
After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from vehicle customization activities compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Customizations / Total Cost of Customizations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Rate at which new and innovative customization options are developed and offered to customers.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of New Customization Methods Introduced / Total Number of Customizations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Degree to which vehicle customizations adhere to industry regulations and standards, measured through compliance checks and audits.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Customizations Complying with Regulations / Total Number of Customizations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Total count of vehicle accessory installations completed within a specified period, reflecting the volume of accessory services.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Total Number of Accessory Installations

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of accessory installations completed correctly according to customer requirements and product specifications.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Installations / Total Number of Installations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the quality and outcome of accessory installations, typically obtained through post-installation surveys.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Accessory Installation

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to complete an accessory installation from the initial order to the final delivery, reflecting the efficiency of the installation process.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Average Time from Accessory Installation Order to Completion

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for each accessory installation, including labor, materials, and overhead expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Total Cost of Accessory Installations / Total Number of Accessory Installations

After Sales+Extended Services.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) from accessory installations.
After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from accessory installations compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Installations / Total Cost of Installations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.KPIS: Accessory installation compliance with safety standards.
After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Degree to which accessory installations adhere to safety regulations and standards, measured through compliance checks and audits.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Installations Complying with Safety Standards / Total Number of Installations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Rate at which new and innovative accessory installation options or techniques are developed and implemented.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of New Installation Methods Introduced / Total Number of Installations) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Total number of extended warranties sold within a specified period, reflecting the success of the warranty sales strategy.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Total Number of Extended Warranties Sold

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers who purchase an extended warranty compared to the total number of customers who are offered the warranty.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Extended Warranties Sold / Total Number of Customers) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of sales transactions that include the purchase of an extended warranty, measured as a ratio of warranty sales to total sales.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Vehicles Sold with Warranties / Total Number of Vehicles Sold) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of extended warranties that result in a claim, calculated as the number of claims divided by the total number of warranties sold.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Warranty Claims / Total Number of Warranties Sold) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the terms, coverage, and overall value of extended warranties, typically gathered through post-purchase surveys.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding Extended Warranties

After Sales+Extended Services.KPIS: Return on investment (ROI) from extended warranty sales.
After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from extended warranty sales compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Extended Warranty Sales / Total Cost of Extended Warranty Sales) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred for selling an extended warranty, including marketing, administration, and sales expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Total Cost of Extended Warranty Sales / Total Number of Extended Warranties Sold

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of the overall effectiveness of the extended warranty program, based on customer feedback, claim management, and financial performance.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Average Effectiveness Score of the Warranty Program

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of eligible customers who enroll in a protection plan, calculated as the number of enrollees divided by the total number of eligible customers.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Enrolled Customers / Total Number of Eligible Customers) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of protection plans that are activated after purchase, measured as the number of activated plans compared to the total number of purchased plans.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Activated Plans / Total Number of Sold Plans) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of protection plans that are actively used by customers, indicating how often customers take advantage of the plan’s benefits.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Used Plans / Total Number of Activated Plans) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Measure of customer satisfaction with the protection plan’s coverage, benefits, and overall value, typically collected through post-enrollment surveys.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding the Protection Plan

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Percentage of protection plan customers who renew their plans at the end of the coverage period, indicating the plan’s value and effectiveness.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Renewed Plans / Total Number of Expired Plans) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.KPIS: ROI (Return on Investment) from protection plans.
After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Financial return achieved from protection plans compared to the costs incurred, calculated as the ratio of benefits to expenses.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Net Benefits from Protection Plans / Total Cost of Protection Plans) * 100

After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to support each protection plan member, including administrative and support costs.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: Total Cost of Protection Plans / Total Number of Plan Members

After Sales+Extended Services.KPIS: Protection plan compliance with service level agreements.
After Sales+Extended Services.EXPLANATION: Degree to which the protection plan adheres to the agreed-upon service levels and commitments, measured through audits and performance assessments.
After Sales+Extended Services.FORMULA: (Number of Plans Complying with SLAs / Total Number of Plans) * 100
